githubInfo.description: Powerful new number types and numeric abstractions for Scala.
githubInfo.readme:
Spire

Spire is a numeric library for Scala which is intended to be generic, fast, and precise.

See the companion microsite

openIssues.title: math.log can not calculate some result.
